history.narrative: Law 1-49 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-27, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 21, 1975 and November 4, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 20, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-69 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
